{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

## Effects

## Notes

* Most of the strength of this ability comes from the fact that it gives the caster a pair of two-handed weapons. The duel-wield recovery time bonus of -30% negates much of the recovery time penalty that comes from these types of weapons, and with [Two Weapon Style](/twoWeaponStyleDeadfire/) even more so.
* Note that because the weapons are marked as one-handed, they do not gain bonuses targeting two-handed weapons (e.g. [Two-Handed Style](/twoHandedStyleDeadfire/))
